name: Kalos
author: Karp Karpity
Crobat
Espeon
Arcanine
tips: Type Matchups: Type immunities are simulated as immunity to kills. (For example, flying-type pokemon will evade nightkills and daykills from ground-type pokemon.) This only applies to nightkills and daykills.
Mega Evolutions: Any kill that any pokemon sided with the mega evolutions has is UNSHARED.
Trainers: These are conspirators. They are not sided with anyone. They can help or refuse to help any role they choose.
lynchmsg: ~Player~ (~Role~) fainted after being attacked by ~Count~ other pokemon!
drawmsg: Everyone has fainted, leaving the Kalos region completely empty...
summary: A battle has broken out in the Kalos region! The pokemon of the notorious Team Flare have attempted to gain control of the land. The legendaries look to reclaim the land believed to originally be theirs. Meanwhile, the rise of a new power, mega evolution, threatens all factions! While all of that is happening, trainers have entered the region looking to evolve (and simultaneously powerup) pokemon for their pokedexes! Can the pokemon native to Kalos defend their region?

sides.winmsg: ~Players~ have defended the Kalos region from all threats and kept it as a safehaven for all pokemon!
This land is now the property of Team Flare! ~Players~ can't be stopped now!
~Players~, the titans of the Kalos region, have reclaimed it as their own.
A mysterious power known to all, but mastered by few. ~Players~ have exercised the power of mega evolution through their triumph over the other pokemon!
Looks like only the trainers have survived this battle! ~Players~ leave the Kalos region in search of new pokemon for their pokedexes.

roles.help: Since you tend to use your large ears to dig holes all night, you have no special commands. Vote to remove people during the day! However, starting on the third night, you have a 50% chance to evolve into Diggersby!
roles.info: Has a 50% chance to evolve into Diggersby starting night 3. Evades nightkills from Gengar and Mega Gengar. ~Sided~

dummy.msg: ±Info: ~Self~ doesn't need an item to evolve!

roles.help: You're much stronger than your previous form! Thanks to your Huge Power ability, your vote has been doubled, so you now have a vote of 2!
roles.info: Vote of 2. Evades nightkills from Gengar and Mega Gengar. Evades daykills from Ampharos, Manectric, and Mega Manectric. ~Sided~

dummy.msg: ±Info: ~Self~ doesn't need an item to evolve!

roles.help: You're a friendly little bird that likes to send signals via your chirps! You can do this during the day using /chirp, and your teammates have a 10% chance to hax it! However, Zygarde also has a 10% chance to hax it. You will evolve into Fletchinder on the second night.
roles.info: Can chirp during the day (teammates and Zygarde have a 10% chance to hax this). Evolves into Fletchinder on night 2. Evades nightkills from Gengar, Mega Gengar, Garchomp, and Mega Garchomp. ~Sided~

chirp.msg: You can now use /chirp! Your teammates have a 10% chance to hax this, but so does Zygarde!

roles.info: Can bird (kill) or blitz (kill) one person during the standby (reveals user). Evolves into Talonflame on night 4. Evades nightkills from Garchomp and Mega Garchomp. ~Sided~

roles.help: As a ninja pokemon, you have now gained a plethora of new abilities! You can still inspect with Extrasensory using /sense. However, you can poison someone instead with Gunk Shot using /gunk. If neither of those suit you, you can always kill someone with Night Slash using /slash or kill with Hydro Pump using /pump. Hydro Pump has a 20% chance to miss, but it can't be distracted. You can only use one of these four commands each night, and thanks to your Protean ability, you will change into the type of the move you used! If the move you use is the same as your typing, it will have a 50% chance to pierce bodyguards and safeguards. You are currently a Water/Dark type.
roles.info: Can sense (inspect), gunk (poison), slash (kill), or pump (kill, 20% fail chance, can't be distracted) one person during the night. Changes typing based on what command was used (sense is psychic, gunk is poison, slash is dark, pump is water). STAB commands have a 50% chance to pierce bodyguards and safeguards. Evades nightkills from Delphox (only /psychic), Meowstic-F, and Mewtwo. Evades Mega Mewtwo Y's daykills. ~Sided~

roles.help: With  your evolution, you gain a boost of strength, mainly through your Moxie  ability. When you use your team's /kill, it has a 50% chance to pierce  protection. Each time you make the kill, its pierce chance increases!
roles.info: Can  kill (50% pierce chance) one person during the night. Each subsequent  kill has a higher pierce chance (65%, 80%, 100%). Evades nightkills  from Delphox (only /psychic), Meowstic-F, and Mewtwo. Evades Mega  Mewtwo Y's daykills. ~Sided~

dummy.msg: ±Info: ~Self~ doesn't need an item to evolve!

kill.usermsg: Your next kill will have a 65% chance to pierce protection!

roles.help: With   your evolution, you gain a boost of strength, mainly through your  Moxie  ability. When you use your team's /kill, it has a 65% chance to  pierce  protection. Each time you make the kill, its pierce chance  increases!
roles.info: Can   kill (65% pierce chance) one person during the night. Each subsequent   kill has a higher pierce chance (80%, 100%). Evades nightkills   from Delphox (only /psychic), Meowstic-F, and Mewtwo. Evades Mega   Mewtwo Y's daykills. ~Sided~

dummy.msg: ±Info: ~Self~ doesn't need an item to evolve!

kill.usermsg: Your next kill will have a 80% chance to pierce protection!

roles.help: With   your evolution, you gain a boost of strength, mainly through your  Moxie  ability. When you use your team's /kill, it has a 80% chance to  pierce  protection. Each time you make the kill, its pierce chance  increases!
roles.info: Can   kill (80% pierce chance) one person during the night. Subsequent kills will always pierce protection. Evades nightkills   from Delphox (only /psychic), Meowstic-F, and Mewtwo. Evades Mega   Mewtwo Y's daykills. ~Sided~

dummy.msg: ±Info: ~Self~ doesn't need an item to evolve!

kill.usermsg: From now on, your kills will always pierce protection!

roles.help: With   your evolution, you gain a boost of strength, mainly through your  Moxie  ability. When you use your team's /kill, it will  pierce  protection!
roles.info: Can  kill (pierces protection) one person during the night. Evades nightkills   from Delphox (only /psychic), Meowstic-F, and Mewtwo. Evades Mega   Mewtwo Y's daykills. ~Sided~

dummy.msg: ±Info: ~Self~ doesn't need an item to evolve!

roles.help: Your sturdy skull allows you to headbutt everything, giving you a /kill at night that's shared with your team. Your ability to pull your skin up to your neck to protect yourself allows you to evade 1 nightkill and 1 poison, as well as identify your attackers! You will evolve into Scrafty on the fifth night.
roles.info: Can kill one person during the night. Evades 1 nightkill and 1 poison (also identifies attackers). Evolves into Scrafty on night 5. Evades nightkills from Delphox (only /psychic), Meowstic-F, and Mewtwo. Evades Mega   Mewtwo Y's daykills. ~Sided~

dummy.msg: ±Info: ~Self~ doesn't need an item to evolve!

kill.evadechargemsg: ~Target~ is ~Role~ and they tried to kill you!

poison.evadechargemsg: ~Target~ is ~Role~ and they tried to poison you!

roles.help: Bigger, badder, and bulkier, that's who you are. Assert your dominance using your team's /kill every night! As a testament to how hard you are to bring down, you evade TWO nightkills and TWO poisons, as well as identify your attackers!
roles.info: Can kill one person  during the night. Evades 2 nightkills and 2 poisons (also identifies  attackers). Evades nightkills   from  Delphox (only /psychic), Meowstic-F, and Mewtwo. Evades Mega   Mewtwo  Y's daykills. ~Sided~

dummy.msg: ±Info: ~Self~ doesn't need an item to evolve!

kill.evadechargemsg: ~Target~ is ~Role~ and they tried to kill you!

poison.evadechargemsg: ~Target~ is ~Role~ and they tried to poison you!

roles.help: You're a devious cat that likes to steal from others when they least expect it. While you can't kill, you can /fakeout someone to distract them for that night! You will evolve into Liepard on the third night.
roles.info: Can fakeout (distract) one person during the night. Evolves into Liepard on night 3. Evades nightkills from  Delphox (only /psychic), Meowstic-F, and Mewtwo. Evades Mega Mewtwo Y's daykills. ~Sided~

dummy.msg: ±Info: ~Self~ doesn't need an item to evolve!

fakeout.tarmsg: You flinched and couldn't do anything last night! Your Steadfast ability raised your speed!
fakeout.distractmsg: Purrloin used Fake Out! You flinched and couldn't do anything last night!
fakeout.teammsg: Your partner was too timid to do anything, so you couldn't ~Action~ last night!

roles.help: The mischief and deception has been taken to the next level. You now share a /kill with your teammates, and your /fakeout (distract) is now the fastest command in the game thanks to your speed and Prankster!
roles.info: Can kill one person during the night. Can fakeout (distract) one person during the night. Evades nightkills   from  Delphox (only /psychic), Meowstic-F, and Mewtwo. Evades Mega   Mewtwo  Y's daykills. ~Sided~

dummy.msg: ±Info: ~Self~ doesn't need an item to evolve!

fakeout.tarmsg: You flinched and couldn't do anything last night! Your Steadfast ability raised your speed!
fakeout.distractmsg: Liepard used Fake Out! You flinched and couldn't do anything last night!
fakeout.teammsg: Your partner was too timid to do anything, so you couldn't ~Action~ last night!

roles.help: You slept for a thousand years in the form of a tree. With your revival, you can unleash your true power! Starting on the fourth day, you will be able to kill someone using /moonblast. Your ability to share eternal life gives you a vote of 5.
roles.info: Vote of 5. Can moonblast (kill) one person during the standby starting on day 4 (user is not revealed). Evades nightkills from Mega Charizard X (only /pulse) and Ampharos. Evades daykills from Gible, Gabite, Garchomp, and Mega Garchomp. ~Sided~

dummy.msg: ±Info: ~Self~ doesn't need an item to evolve!

moonblast.msg: You can now kill someone with /moonblast [name]! You won't be revealed either!
moonblast.killmsg: Harvesting the power of the moon, Xerneas summons a large bright ball and sends it crashing towards ~Target~!

roles.help: When you spread your wings wide, you have the ability to absorb the life force of other pokemon. Starting on the fourth night, you can do this with Oblivion Wing and /oblivion [name] to kill them. All the energy you absorb from others gives you a -5 voteshield.
roles.info: Voteshield of -5. Can oblivion (kill) one person during the night. Evades nightkills from Garchomp, Mega Garchomp, Delphox (only /psychic), Meowstic-F, and Mewtwo. Evades Mega Mewtwo Y's daykills. ~Sided~

dummy.msg: ±Info: ~Self~ doesn't need an item to evolve!

roles.help: You lurk deep in Terminus Cave, watching those who destroy the ecosystem. As a result, you do not kill, but can /safeguard TWO pokemon to protect them from kills and poison. Your careful watching over everyone also gives you a small chance to hax every night command as well as every day command that doesn't reveal its user.
roles.info: Can safeguard (protect + safeguard) two people during the night. Small hax on every night command and every day command that doesn't reveal its user. Evades daykills from Manectric, Mega Manectric, and Ampharos. ~Sided~

dummy.msg: ±Info: ~Self~ doesn't need an item to evolve!

roles.help: What's with that strange seed on your back? Ah well, it appears to be quite useful, as it can release poison that you can use to /poison your enemies every night. However, since you're quite weak, this poison takes 2 nights to kill. You will evolve into Ivysaur on the second night.
roles.info: Can poison one person during the night (poison takes 2 nights to kill). Evolves into Ivysaur on night 2. ~Sided~

curse.curseConvertMessage: A Bulbasaur has evolved into an Ivysaur!

roles.help: The seed on your back is growing larger and stronger each day. Your /poison now only takes one night to kill! You will evolve into Venusaur on the fourth night.
roles.info: Can poison one person during the night. Evolves into Venusaur on night 4. ~Sided~

curse.curseConvertMessage: An Ivysaur has evolved into a Venusaur!

roles.help: The seed on your back has finally bloomed into a flower, but has become dealier than ever! You can now /poison two people every night, and the poison will kill them both the next night.
roles.info: Can poison two people during the night. ~Sided~

roles.help: With your mega evolution, you have gaind even more power! You can now /poison THREE people every night, killing them all the next night!
roles.info: Can poison three people during the night. ~Sided~

roles.help: The flame on your tail represents your life force. You can /ember someone to kill them at night, but this only has a 50% chance of working. You will evolve into Charmeleon on the second night.
roles.info: Can ember (kill, 50% fail chance) one person during the night. Evolves into Charmeleon on night 2. ~Sided~

curse.curseConvertMessage: A Charmander has evolved into a Charmeleon!

roles.help: You like to attack your opponents with your sharp claws before finishing them with your flaming tail. Burn your enemies at night using /flame! Since you're stronger, this kill doesn't have a chance of failure. You will evolve into Charizard on the fourth night.
roles.info: Can flame (kill) one person during the night. Evolves into Charizard on night 4. ~Sided~

curse.curseConvertMessage: A Charmeleon has evolved into a Charizard!

roles.help: You search the skies in search of only the strongest opponents! Using a fierce Heat Wave, incinerate your opponents at night with /wave! Since you're faster than your previous evolution, your kill is also faster as well!
roles.info: Can wave (kill) one person during the night. ~Sided~

roles.help: With a massive surge in strength, you can dominate the skies with your power! Use /wave during the night to burn your enemies into oblivion, and use /slash during the day to kill a second person! These kills won't reveal you either.
roles.info: Can wave (kill) one person during the night. Can slash (kill) one person during the standby (user is not revealed). ~Sided~

slash.msg: You can now kill someone using Air Slash with /slash [name]. You won't be revealed!
slash.killmsg: Mega Charizard Y conjures up a blade of air that slices ~Target~ and the air around them!

roles.help: You are now a physical titan with superior strength. You can kill one person at night with Heat Wave using /wave and kill a second person at night with Dragon Pulse using /pulse! Remember that fairy-type pokemon are immune to your /pulse!
roles.info: Can wave (kill) one person during the night. Can pulse (kill) a second person during the night. ~Sided~

roles.help: As a tiny turtle, you're hard to find. Use your size to /stalk one person every night! You will evolve into Wartortle on the second night.
roles.info: Can stalk one person during the night. Evolves into Wartortle on night 2. ~Sided~

curse.curseConvertMessage: A Squirtle has evolved into a Wartortle!

roles.help: Now that you're a little stronger and sturdier, you can do a little bit more for your team! Your /stalk not only stalks now, but will additionally watch your target as well, so you can use this on your teammates or yourself. You will evolve into Blastoise on the fourth night.
roles.info: Can stalk (stalk + watch) one person during the night. Evolves into Blastoise on night 4. ~Sided~

curse.curseConvertMessage: A Wartortle has evolved into a Blastoise!

roles.help: You're  even stronger and sturdier than ever before! You can still /stalk  anyone (including yourself or your teammates) to stalk and watch them,  but now this can't be blocked by safeguarders!
roles.info: Can stalk (stalk + watch, pierces safeguard) one person during the night. ~Sided~

roles.help: Your  mega evolution doubles your usefulness and capability, allowing you to  now /stalk two people every night to see who they visited and see who  visisted them! Like before, this can't be blocked by safeguarders!
roles.info: Can stalk (stalk + watch, pierces safeguard) two people during the night. ~Sided~

roles.help: You  spend most of the day asleep, so you have no commands and your vote is  zero! You will evolve into Kadabra on the third night.
roles.info: Vote of 0. Evolves into Kadabra on night 3. ~Sided~

curse.curseConvertMessage: An Abra has evolved into a Kadabra!

roles.help: Your  strong psychic powers allow you to inspect one person at night using  /eye! A trainer will have to trade you in order for you to evolve.
roles.info: Can eye (inspect) one person during the night. Evolves if traded by a trainer. ~Sided~

roles.help: You have a massive IQ of 5,000, and thus can inspect two people at night using /eye!
roles.info: Can eye (inspect) one person during the night. ~Sided~

roles.help: No brakes on the IQ train! Your intense knowledge allows you to use /eye to inspect three people every night!
roles.info: Can eye (inspect) three people during the night. ~Sided~

roles.help: Your  body is made entirely of poisonous gas. As a ghost, you can put people  to sleep to distract them using /hypnosis! You will evolve into Haunter  on the third night.
roles.info: Can hypnosis (distract) one person during the night. Evolves into Haunter on night 3.

hypnosis.distractmsg: You were put to sleep and couldn't do anything last night!
hypnosis.teammsg: Your partner was too busy sleeping for you to ~Action~ anyone!

curse.curseConvertMessage: A Gastly has evolved into a Haunter!

roles.help: You  lurk in the darkness, watching and waiting for prey. Attack your foes  with a devastating /hypnosis! This will both distract them and poison  them! A trainer will have to trade you in order for you to evolve!
roles.info: Can hypnosis (distract + poison) one person during the night. Evolves if traded by a trainer. ~Sided~

hypnosis.distractmsg: You were put to sleep and couldn't do anything last night!
hypnosis.teammsg: Your partner was too busy sleeping for you to ~Action~ anyone!

roles.help: You  hide in the shadows and absorb the heat of your victims, causing them  to quake with chilling fear. You can /hex one person every night; this  will distract, poison, and kill them!
roles.info: Can hex (distract + poison + kill) one person during the night. ~Sided~

hex.distractmsg: You were put to sleep and couldn't do anything last night!
hex.teammsg: Your partner was too busy sleeping for you to ~Action~ anyone!

roles.help: A  large embodiment of fear and darkness, you continue to prey on the  helpless. Your /hex still distracts, poisons, and kills, but now the  poison will also kill your victim on the same night!
roles.info: Can hex (distract + poison that kills on the same night + kill) one person during the night. ~Sided~

hex.distractmsg: You were put to sleep and couldn't do anything last night!
hex.teammsg: Your partner was too busy sleeping for you to ~Action~ anyone!

roles.help: You  are very protective of your offspring, and won't let any harm come to  it. Demonstrate your protective power by slugging your enemies with a  Mega Punch using /punch at night!
roles.info: Can punch (kill) one person during the night. ~Sided~

roles.help: Your  offspring has now grown strong enough to assist you in battle! With the  help of your Parental Bond ability, you can now kill twice every night  using /punch!
roles.info: Can punch (kill) two people during the night. ~Sided~

roles.help: You're  an astoundingly strong bug pokemon that can /scissor one person at  night to crush them between the might of your two pincers!
roles.info: Can scissor (kill) one person during the night. ~Sided~

roles.help: Harder,  faster, better, stronger are a few words that describe you quite  nicely. Your /scissor kill now has a 35% chance to pierce protection,  and you also have a 35% chance to evade nightkills and daykills!
roles.info: Can scissor (kill, 35% pierce chance) one person during the night. Has a 35% chance to evade nightkills and daykills. ~Sided~

roles.help: Poor  you. You're just about as weak and useless as it gets. Not only do you  lack any commands, but your vote is zero! Not to worry though, you will  evolve into Gyarados on the third night.
roles.info: Vote of 0. Evolves into Gyarados on night 3. ~Sided~

curse.curseConvertMessage: A Magikarp has evolved into a Gyarados!

roles.help: You are huge, vicious, and atrocious! Your violent impulse allows you to kill each night with Aqua Tail using /tail!
roles.info: Can tail (kill) one person during the night. ~Sided~

roles.help: Your  mega evolution has granted your violent impulse with more devastating  power! Wreak havoc on your foes by killing one with /tail every night  and another with /crunch every other night!
roles.info: Can tail (kill) one person during the night. Can crunch (kill) a second person during the night every other night. ~Sided~

roles.help: Known  as the king of the skies back in ancient times, you're here to prove  that nothing has changed and you still reign in the air! Take down those  who oppose you with Rock Slide using /slide each night!
roles.info: Can slide (kill) one person during the night. ~Sided~

roles.help: Your mega evolution makes it even harder for others to stop your kills! Your Rock Slides (/slide) now have a 50% chance to pierce protection!
roles.info: Can slide (kill, 50% pierce chance) one person during the night. ~Sided~

roles.help: After years of scientific work and power, you were created. Your intelligence and savage power allow you to either /inspect two people every night or kill one person using /cut. However, you are unable to kill dark-type pokemon.
roles.info: Can either inspect two people during the night or cut (kill) one person during the night. ~Sided~

inspect.inputmsg: Target locked on. Data acquired. Now analyzing and processing ~Target~'s data...

roles.help: So much power has been unleashed from within. You have broken free of any and all restrictions, so you can now inspect two people at night using /zen AND kill someone at night using /drain! Thanks to your Steadfast ability, every time you flinch (are distracted), your speed will increase, allowing your kill to have higher priority!
roles.info: Can zen (inspect) two people during the night. Can drain (kill) one person during the night. Every time it's distracted, the priority on its kill increases. +4 outspeeds all other killers, +5 outspeeds bodyguards, and +6 outspeeds everything except for Liepard's distract. ~Sided~

zen.inputmsg: Target locked on. Data acquired. Now analyzing and processing ~Target~'s data...

roles.help: So much power has been unleashed from within. You have broken free of any  and all restrictions, so you can now inspect two people at night using  /zen AND kill someone at night using /drain! Thanks to your Steadfast ability, every time you flinch (are distracted), your speed will  increase, allowing your kill to have higher priority!

Thanks to your Steadfast ability, every time you flinch (are distracted), your speed will  increase, allowing your kill to have higher priority!

Thanks to your Steadfast ability, every time you flinch (are distracted), your speed will  increase, allowing your kill to have higher priority!

zen.inputmsg: Target locked on. Data acquired. Now analyzing and processing ~Target~'s data...

roles.help: So much power has been unleashed from within. You have broken free of any  and all restrictions, so you can now inspect two people at night using  /zen AND kill someone at night using /drain! Thanks to your Steadfast ability, every time you flinch (are distracted), your speed will  increase, allowing your kill to have higher priority! Your kill now outspeeds all other killers!

zen.inputmsg: Target locked on. Data acquired. Now analyzing and processing ~Target~'s data...

roles.help: So much power has been unleashed from within. You have broken free of any and all restrictions, so you can now inspect two people at night using  /zen AND kill someone at night using /drain! Thanks to your Steadfast ability, every time you flinch (are distracted), your speed will  increase, allowing your kill to have higher priority! Your kill now outspeeds bodyguards!

zen.inputmsg: Target locked on. Data acquired. Now analyzing and processing ~Target~'s data...

roles.help: So much power has been unleashed from within. You have broken free of any and all restrictions, so you can now inspect two people at night using  /zen AND kill someone at night using /drain! Your kill now outspeeds everything except for Liepard's distract!

zen.inputmsg: Target locked on. Data acquired. Now analyzing and processing ~Target~'s data...

roles.help: After  years of scientific work and power, you were created. Your intelligence allows you to /inspect four people every night.
roles.info: Can inspect four people during the night. ~Sided~

inspect.inputmsg: Target locked on. Data acquired. Now analyzing and processing ~Target~'s data...

roles.help: Such amazing power has been granted to you. On top of your four /inspects every night, you can also kill someone during the day using /strike without revealing yourself! You also can't be distracted by Vivillon.
roles.info: Can inspect four people during the night. Ignores Vivillon's distract. Can strike (kill) one person during the standby (user is not revealed). ~Sided~

inspect.inputmsg: Target locked on. Data acquired. Now analyzing and processing ~Target~'s data...

strike.msg: You can now kill someone with Psystrike using /strike [name]! Remember that this won't reveal you and dark-type pokemon will evade this kill!
strike.killmsg: Mega Mewtwo Y materializes an odd psychic wave, then strikes ~Target~ with it at full power!

roles.help: All of that wool you have rubs together to create quite a static charge! In fact, you can use this to /wave someone during the day once! This will reveal their role to everyone! You will evolve into Flaaffy on the second night.
roles.info: Can wave (expose) someone during the day (user is not revealed) once a game. Evolves into Flaaffy on night 2. ~Sided~

wave.msg: You can type /wave [name] to reveal someone's role!
wave.exposemsg: Mareep used Thunder Wave! ~Target~ was paralyzed! Unable to move, everyone could see that they were a ~Role~!

curse.curseConvertMessage: A Mareep has evolved into a Flaaffy!

roles.help: Your color might be different than before but your paralyzing ability remains the same! You can now expose someone's role everyday using /wave without revealing yourself! You will evolve into Ampharos on the fourth night.
roles.info: Can wave (expose) someone during the day (user is not revealed). Evolves into Ampharos on night 4. ~Sided~

wave.msg: You can type /wave [name] to reveal someone's role!
wave.exposemsg: Flaaffy used Thunder Wave! ~Target~ was paralyzed! Unable to move, everyone could see that they were a ~Role~!

curse.curseConvertMessage: A Flaaffy has evolved into an Ampharos!

roles.help: The electricity you have is so immense that the glow from your tail is used as a beacon for lost people! Therefore, you can expose TWO people's roles every day using /wave!
roles.info: Can wave (expose) two people during the day (user is not revealed). ~Sided~

wave.msg: You can type /wave [name] to reveal someone's role!
wave.exposemsg: Ampharos used Thunder Wave! ~Target~ was paralyzed! Unable to move, everyone could see that they were a ~Role~!

roles.help: If your enemies aren't gazing in awe at your new appearance (especially your mane), they'll be awestruck when you show them your power! You can still expose two people every day using /wave, but now you can do so much more. You can kill someone during the day with /thunder every other day. You can also kill someone every other night using /pulse! Thanks to your Mold Breaker ability, opposing pokemon can't evade your kills due to their typing (ground-types can't evade your daykills while fairy-types can't evade your nightkills)!
roles.info: Can wave (expose) two people during the standby (user is not revealed). Can thunder (kill) one person during the standby every other day (user is not revealed). Can pulse (kill) one person during the night every other night. Ground-types can't evade its daykills. Fairy-types can't evade its nightkills. ~Sided~

wave.msg: You can type /wave [name] to reveal someone's role!
wave.exposemsg: Mega Ampharos used Thunder Wave! ~Target~ was paralyzed! Unable to move, everyone could see that they were a ~Role~!

thunder.msg: You can now kill someone with /thunder [name] and this won't reveal you!
thunder.killmsg: A massive thunderbolt strikes ~Target~ with incredible force, instantly obliterating them!

roles.help: You tear through your prey using your sharp scythes. However, you've decided to restrain yourself. During the day, and only once a game, you can /swipe someone to reveal their role to everyone.
roles.info: Can swipe (expose) someone during the day once a game (user is not revealed). ~Sided~

swipe.msg: You can type /swipe [name] to reveal someone's role!
swipe.exposemsg: Scyther attacks ~Target~ with a restrained attack. Left shocked and motionless, everyone can see that ~Target~ is a ~Role~!

roles.help: It seems a trainer has given you a Metal Coat! If they trade you as well, you will evolve into Scizor! Until then you can still /swipe once a game during the day to expose someone's role!
roles.info: Can swipe (expose) someone during the day once a game (user is not revealed). Evolves into Scizor if traded by a trainer. ~Sided~

swipe.msg: You can type /swipe [name] to reveal someone's role!
swipe.exposemsg: Scyther attacks ~Target~ with a restrained attack. Left shocked and motionless, everyone can see that ~Target~ is a ~Role~!

roles.help: With a body made of steel, it will take more than just ordinary attacks to bring you down. For this reason, you will evade 1 nightkill!
roles.info: Evades one nightkill. ~Sided~

kill.evadechargemsg: You were strong enough to survive a nightkill, but you won't be able to survive another one!

roles.help: Your large and powerful pincers allow you to /bullet someone to kill them with Bullet Punch at night. If you don't feel like killing, you can always use your steel body to /protect yourself instead, but you can't do both actions on the same night!
roles.info: Can either bullet (kill) one person during the night or protect itself during the night. ~Sided~

roles.help: Your horn allows you to fight off powerful enemies! While you do not wish to pick fights, you have no commands. However, if you are lynched, you will be able to kill someone before dying!
roles.info: If lynched, can kill one person (can't be distracted or killed) during the night before dying. ~Sided~

roles.help: Time to showcase that large horn of yours by killing someone with /megahorn before you die! You can't be distracted or killed, meaning only bodyguards can block this kill!

poison.poisonDeadMessage: You put up a good fight. Your work here is finished...and so are you.

roles.help: Your power stays the same despite your mega evolution, with one small difference. Thanks to your new ability, Skill Link, you will be able to kill FIVE people before dying if you are lynched!
roles.info: If lynched, can kill five people (can't be distracted or killed) during the night before dying. ~Sided~

lynch.convertmsg: ~Self~ (~Old~) can kill five people before dying! Mess with the Mega Heracross, and you get the horn!

roles.help: Time to showcase that  large horn of yours by killing FIVE people with /combat before you die!  You can't be distracted or killed, meaning only bodyguards can block  this kill!

poison.poisonDeadMessage: You put up a good fight. Your work here is finished...and so are you.

roles.help: You roam in packs to hunt down your prey! Use your /bite to attack someone and prevent them from using any actions during the night! You will evolve into Houndoom on the third night.
roles.info: Can bite (distract) one person during the night. Evolves into Houndoom on night 3. ~Sided~

bite.distractmsg: Houndour used Bite! You flinched and couldn't do anything last night!
bite.teammsg: Your partner was too timid to move, preventing you from using your ~Action~!

curse.curseConvertMessage: A Houndour has evolved into a Houndoom!

roles.help: The flames you breathe can scorch just about anything, and that includes your enemies! Kill them every night using /flame!
roles.info: Can flame (kill) one person during the night. ~Sided~

roles.help: Your powerful fire attacks continue, but now, they are so strong that they will pierce protection! Additionally, you will ignore all distractors! However, due to your ability, Solar Power, you will die after 8 nights.
roles.info: Can flame (kill, pierces protection) one person during the night. Can't be distracted. Dies after 8 nights. Evades nightkills from Delphox (only /psychic), Meowstic-F, and Mewtwo. Evades Mega Mewtwo Y's daykills. ~Sided~

poison.poisonDeadMessage: Your Solar Power ability has drained you of all your energy!

roles.help: You are born deep underground, so you spend most of your time eating the soil around you until you have reached the surface. This means you have no commands, but since you're much harder to reach, you will evade one nightkill! You will evolve into Pupitar on the fourth night.
roles.info: Evades 1 nightkill. Evolves into Pupitar on night 4. ~Sided~

kill.evadechargemsg: Being deep underground allowed you to avoid a nightkill, but you won't be able to avoid another one!

curse.curseConvertMessage: A Larvitar has evolved into a Pupitar!

roles.help: Your durable shell is so sturdy that steel can't even hurt it. Its durability allows you to evade two nightkills! You will evolve into Tyranitar on the seventh night.
roles.info: Evades 2 nightkills. Evolves into Tyranitar on night 7. ~Sided~

kill.evadechargemsg: Your sturdy shell has saved you from a kill! It  still can save you from ~EvadeCharges~ other kill(s)!

curse.curseConvertMessage: A Pupitar has evolved into a Tyranitar!

roles.help: Your brute strength allows you to topple mountains and shake the ground as you walk. Crush your enemies by killing one during the day with either /crunch or /stone. These won't reveal you either!
roles.info: Can either crunch (kill) or stone (kill) one person during the standby (user is not revealed). ~Sided~

crunch.msg: You can now kill someone with Crunch using /crunch [name]! Remember that this won't reveal you!
crunch.killmsg: Tyranitar slowly marches toward ~Target~ before taking a fatal bite out of their head.

stone.msg: You can kill a  person with Stone Edge using /stone [name]! Remember that this won't reveal you!
stone.killmsg: Tyranitar takes a large amount of sharpened stones and furiously stabs ~Target~ with them!

roles.help: Larger, stronger, and scarier than before, you can still kill one person during the day using /crunch or /stone. However, no one can deny your power, so these kills now have a 50% chance of revealing you. As a bonus, your additional bulk gives you a whopping 75% chance to evade nightkills and daykills!
roles.info: Can crunch (kill) or stone (kill) one person during the standby (50% reveal chance). Has a 75% chance to evade nightkills and daykills. ~Sided~

crunch.msg: You can now kill someone with Crunch using /crunch [name]! Remember that this has a 50% chance to reveal you!
crunch.killmsg: Tyranitar slowly marches toward ~Target~ before taking a fatal bite out of their head.

stone.killmsg: Tyranitar takes a large amount of sharpened stones and furiously stabs ~Target~ with them!
stone.revealmsg: *** ~Self~ (~Role~) was seen gathering the stones they just used.

roles.help: Unable to fend for yourself, you prefer sticking close to your trainer. You have no special commands as a result, but you will evolve into Combusken on the second night.
roles.info: Evolves into Combusken on night 2. ~Sided~

curse.curseConvertMessage: A Torchic has evolved into a Combusken!

roles.help: You can kick up to ten times a second. While you're not yet strong enough to kill, you have a vote of 3! You will evolve into Blaziken on the fourth night.
roles.info: Vote of 3. Evolves into Blaziken on night 4. ~Sided~

curse.curseConvertMessage: A Combusken has evolved into a Blaziken!

roles.help: You have incredibly strong blazing punches that allow you to kill one person at night with either /blitz or /combat. You can use each of these commands only once (unless you mega evolve). Your intense power gives you a vote of 6!
roles.info: Can blitz (kill) or combat (kill) one person during the night. Vote of 6. ~Sided~

Like before, you can only use each of these commands once. However, thanks to your ability, Speed Boost, your kills will gain priority after every night, so you might want to save those kills for bigger threats late game!
roles.info: Can blitz (kill) one person during the night once a game. Can combat (kill) one person during the night once a game. Both commands can't be used to the same night. Kills gain increasing priority each night. +4 outspeeds other killers except Mega Mewtwo X, +5 outspeeds bodyguards, +6 outspeeds everything except for Liepard's distract and +6 Mega Mewtwo X's kill. ~Sided~

curse.curseConvertMessage: Mega Blaziken's Speed Boost has raised its speed!

The horn on your head allows you to sense the emotions of others. Your cheerful and caring nature allows you to /heal one person every other night to protect them from kills and cure them of any poison they may have. You will evolve into Kirlia on the second night.
roles.info: Can heal (protect + detox) one person during the night every other night. Evolves into Kirlia on night 2. ~Sided~

curse.curseConvertMessage: A Ralts has evolved into a Kirlia!

roles.help: The horn on your head allows you to sense the emotions of others. Your  cheerful and caring nature allows you to /heal one person every other night to protect them from kills and cure them of any poison they may have. You will evolve into Kirlia on the second night.
roles.info: Can heal (protect + detox) one person during the night every other night. Evolves into Kirlia on night 2. ~Sided~

curse.curseConvertMessage: A Ralts has evolved into a Kirlia!

roles.help: Two horns are better than one! Your extra horn has given you extra control over your power, allowing you to now use /heal on someone every night! This will protect your target from kills and cure them of any poison they may have! You will evolve into Gallade after one night if a trainer gives you a dawn stone. Otherwise, you will evolve into Gardevoir on the fourth night.
roles.info: Can heal (protect + detox) one person during the night. Evolves into Gardevoir on the fourth night. Evolves into Gallade instead one night after a trainer gives them a dawn stone. ~Sided~

curse.curseConvertMessage: A Kirlia has evolved into a Gardevoir!

roles.help: Two horns are better  than one! Your extra horn has given you extra control over your power,  allowing you to now use /heal on someone every night! This will protect  your target from kills and cure them of any poison they may have! You will evolve into Gardevoir on the fourth night.

curse.curseConvertMessage: A Kirlia has evolved into a Gardevoir!

roles.help: You have the ability to predict the future and sense danger. As such, you can react to it using /heal! Not only will this command protect your target from kills and cure their poison, but it will now also protect your target from poison!
roles.info: Can heal (protect + detox + safeguard) one person during the night. ~Sided~

roles.help: Your psychic power grows even stronger with your mega evolution, allowing you to now /heal TWO people every night to protect them from kills, poison, and cure them of poison!
roles.info: Can heal (protect + detox + safeguard) two people during the night. ~Sided~

heal.targetmsg: Mega Gardevoir cured you of poison!

roles.help: You are a master of courtesy and swordsmanship. Outduel your opponents to kill them during the night with either  Psycho Cut (/cut) or Close Combat (/combat)! Remember that dark-type pokemon will be immune to your /cut.
roles.info: Can either cut (kill) or combat (kill) one person during the night. ~Sided~

roles.help: A pokemon whose elegance and dueling capabilities are matched by few, you continue to eliminate your foes at night with either /cut or /combat. Remember that dark-type pokemon will be immune to your /cut. As an added bonus, you can no longer be distracted!
roles.info: Can either cut (kill) or combat (kill) one person during the night. Can't be distracted. ~Sided~

roles.help: You are quite the deceiver. You lull your opponents into letting their guard down, and then punish them with your massive jaws. You can either distract your enemies with /astonish or destroy them with a Play Rough (/rough)! Your intimidating appearance and steel body makes you evade 2 nightkills as well as gives you an immunity to poison!
roles.info: Can either astonish (distract) or rough (kill) one person during the night. Evades 2 nightkills. ~Sided~

kill.evadechargemsg: Your steel body allowed you to survive a nightkill! It   still can save you from ~EvadeCharges~ other nightkill(s)!

astonish.distractmsg: Mawile used Astonish! You flinched and couldn't do anything last night!
astonish.teammsg: Your partner was too timid last night, making you unable to complete your ~Action~!

roles.help: Your more intimidating and sturdier appearance allows you evade 2 nightkills again! While you can still either /astonish to distract someone or /rough to kill them, your kill now has a 30% chance to pierce protection!
roles.info: Can either astonish (distract) or rough (kill, 30% pierce chance) one person during the night. Evades 2 nightkills. ~Sided~

kill.evadechargemsg: Your steel body allowed you to survive a nightkill! It   still can save you from ~EvadeCharges~ other nightkill(s)!

astonish.distractmsg: Mawile used Astonish! You flinched and couldn't do anything last night!
astonish.teammsg: Your partner was too timid last night, making you unable to complete your ~Action~!

roles.help: You may be small, but you have quite a lot of durability, allowing you to evade 1 nightkill! Your steel typing renders you immune to poison as well. You will evolve into Lairon on the fourth night.
roles.info: Evades 1 nightkill. Evolves into Lairon on night 4. ~Sided~

kill.evadechargemsg: Your sturdy body has saved you from a kill, but it won't save you from any additional kills!

curse.curseConvertMessage: An Aron has evolved into a Lairon!

roles.help: You enjoy showing off just how tough you are. As such, you are able to evade both one nightkill and one daykill! Your steel typing renders you immune to poison as well. You will evolve into Aggron on the fifth night.
roles.info: Evades 1 nightkill and 1 daykill. Evolves into Aggron on night 5. ~Sided~

kill.evadechargemsg: Your sturdy body has saved you from a kill, but it won't save you from any additional kills!

curse.curseConvertMessage: A Lairon has evolved into an Aggron!

roles.help: You like to claim mountains as your own and will patrol your territory, attacking any intruder without hesitation or mercy. As such, you can kill someone every other night using /tail. Your steel typing renders you immune to poison, and you have a 30% chance to evade nightkills!
roles.info: Can tail (kill) one person during the night every other night. Has a 30% chance to evade nightkills. ~Sided~

roles.help: Is there anything that can stop you? Probably not. Your large body and aggressive power allow you to kill every night using /tail! Your steel typing keeps you immune to poison, and your sturdy body allows you to evade two nightkills as well as learn the identity of your attackers!
roles.info: Can tail (kill) one person during the night. Evades 2 nightkills (also identifies attackers). ~Sided~

kill.evadechargemsg: ~Target~ is ~Role~ and they tried to kill you!

roles.help: You meditate during the day and eat very little as part of your training. You can test your strength using /cut or /jumpkick to kill someone during the night. However, since you have a lot to learn, your kill only has a 50% chance of working. Furthermore, dark-type pokemon are immune to your /cut. You will evolve into Medicham on the fourth night.
roles.info: Can either cut (kill, 50% fail chance) or jumpkick (kill, 50% fail chance) one person during the night. Evolves into Medicham on night 4. ~Sided~

curse.curseConvertMessage: A Meditite has evolved into a Medicham!

roles.help: Your intense training is starting to pay off! You can now use both /cut AND /jumpkick at night, allowing you to kill two people! However, your /jumpkick only has a 50% chance of working, and dark-type pokemon evade your /cut.
roles.info: Can cut (kill) one person during the night. Can jumpkick (kill, 50% fail chance) a second person during the night. ~Sided~

roles.help: You have reached your peak form! With maximum power in your hands (and feet), you can /cut and /jumpkick to kill two people every night! While dark-type pokemon will evade your /cut, both of your kills won't fail!
roles.info: Can cut (kill) one person during the night. Can jumpkick (kill) a second person during the night. ~Sided~

roles.help: You can move faster than the human eye can follow. With the help of all the electricity you store in your fur and your Static ability, anyone that tries to kill you during the night will only be able to kill every other night! You will evolve into Manectric on the third night.
roles.info: Anyone that attempts to nightkill it will only be able to kill every other night. Evolves into Manectric on night 3. ~Sided~

curse.curseConvertMessage: An Electrike has evolved into a Manectric!

roles.help: You are constantly discharging lightning from your mane and creating thunderclouds. This allows you to kill during the day using /thunder without being revealed! Anyone that tries to kill you during the night will only be able to kill every other night.
roles.info: Can thunder (kill) one person during the standby (user is not revealed). Anyone that attempts to nightkill it will only be able to kill every other night. ~Sided~

thunder.msg: You can now kill someone with /thunder [name] and this won't reveal you!
thunder.killmsg: A massive thunderbolt strikes ~Target~ with incredible force, instantly obliterating them!

roles.help: Your electricity continues to build in your large mane. You can still discharge it during the day with /thunder to kill someone. If anyone tries to kill you during the night, they will only be able to kill every other night. Thanks to your Intimidate and insane speed, you will evade two nightkills as well!
roles.info: Can thunder (kill) one  person during the standby (user is not revealed). Anyone that attempts  to nightkill it will only be able to kill every other night. Evades 2 nightkills.

thunder.msg: You can now kill someone with /thunder [name] and this won't reveal you!
thunder.killmsg: A massive thunderbolt strikes ~Target~ with incredible force, instantly obliterating them!

kill.evadechargemsg: Your speed allowed you to evade a nightkill, and you can still evade ~EvadeCharges~ other kill(s)!

roles.help: You feed off the dark emotions of others to gain power. While you're doing that, you can /frisk someone to see what item they need to evolve or mega evolve, and with your Destiny Bond, you will take anyone that kills you down with you, whether it be during the night or day! You will evolve into Banette on the fourth night.
roles.info: Can frisk one person during the night to see what item they need to evolve or mega evolve. Revenges nightkills and daykills. Evolves into Banette on night 4. ~Sided~

curse.curseConvertMessage: A Shuppet has evolved into a Banette!

kill.msg: '~Target~'s Destiny Bond took you down with them!

actions.daykillrevengemsg: ~Target~ attacks ~Self~! ~Self~ fainted! ~Self~'s Destiny Bond took ~Target~ down with him!

roles.help: You are full of strong feelings of hatred and malice. You only wish to harm others now. Afflict two of your enemies with a deadly /curse that will kill them after four nights! Since these curses rely on energy released from you when you stick pins into your own body, each curse has a 50% chance to kill you! Your Destiny Bond allows you to revenge all nightkills an daykills. You can still /frisk someone to see what item they need to evolve or mega evolve.
roles.info: Can frisk one person during the night to see what item they need to evolve or mega evolve. Can curse (poison that kills after 4 nights, 50% suicide chance) two people during the night. Revenges nightkills and daykills. ~Sided~

kill.msg: '~Target~'s Destiny Bond took you down with them!

actions.daykillrevengemsg: ~Target~ attacks ~Self~! ~Self~ fainted! ~Self~'s  Destiny Bond took ~Target~ down with him!

roles.help: You lust for absolute revenge and retribution long after you were abandoned. Engulf two of your enemies in darkness with your /curse that will kill after 4 nights but has a 50% chance to kill you as well. You can still /frisk someone to see what item they need to evolve or mega evolve. You have gained the ability to instill fear in your opponents and render them motionless via your /scare, and as always, your Destiny Bond allows you to revenge nightkills and daykills!
roles.info: Can  frisk one person during the night to see what item they need to evolve  or mega evolve. Can scare (distract) one person during the night. Can curse (poison that kills after 4 nights, 50% suicide  chance) two people during the night. Revenges nightkills and daykills.  ~Sided~

scare.distractmsg: You couldn't move as you were paralyzed by Banette's ominous glare.
scare.teammsg: Your partner was unable to move at all last night, making you unable to ~Action~ anyone!

kill.msg: '~Target~'s Destiny Bond took you down with them!

actions.daykillrevengemsg: ~Target~ attacks ~Self~! ~Self~ fainted! ~Self~'s  Destiny Bond took ~Target~ down with him!

roles.help: You only appear if disaster is near. Since you can sense impending disaster, you have a strong chance to hax killers. You can also bring some of your own doom using /slash at night to kill someone. This has a 50% chance to pierce protection!
roles.info: Can slash (kill, 50% pierce chance) one person during the night. High hax on nightkills. ~Sided~

roles.help: You're much stronger and faster than before, allowing you to cause even more disaster! You still have high hax on kills, your /slash now has a 75% chance to pierce protection, and you will kill anyone that tries to distract, poison, or inspect you at night!
roles.info: Can slash (kill, 75% pierce chance) one person during the night. Kills anyone that tries to distract, poison, or inspect it during the night. High hax on nightkills. ~Sided~

inspect.targetmsg: You got way too close to Mega Absol, and it showed you what true disaster is.
inspect.msg: An unsuspecting ~Role~ got too close to you. You showed them what true disaster can be.

poison.targetmsg: You got way too close to Mega Absol, and it showed you what true disaster is.
poison.msg: An unsuspecting ~Role~ got too close to you. You showed them what true disaster can be.

distract.targetmsg: You got way too close when you distracted Mega Absol, and it showed you what true disaster is.
distract.msg: An unsuspecting ~Role~ distracted you. You showed them what true disaster can be.

roles.help: You will attack anyone that gets too close to you. As a land shark, you can kill someone during the day using /outrage! However, fairy-types will evade this kill and it has a 50% chance to reveal you! You will evolve into Gabite on the third night.
roles.info: Can outrage (kill) one person during the standby (50% reveal chance). Evolves into Gabite on night 3. ~Sided~

outrage.msg: You can now kill someone with /outrage [name]. This has a 50% chance to reveal you, and fairy-types will evade this kill!

curse.curseConvertMessage: A Gible has evolved into a Gabite!

roles.help: You've got more control over yourself. You can still kill someone during the day with /outrage, but fairy-types still evade this kill. Since you aren't as reckless as you used to be, this kill no longer has a chance to reveal you. You will evolve into Garchomp on the sixth night.
roles.info: Can outrage (kill) one person during the standby (user is not revealed). Evolves into Garchomp on night 6. ~Sided~

curse.curseConvertMessage: A Chespin has evolved into a Quilladin!

outrage.msg: You can now kill someone with /outrage [name]. Fairy types evade this, but you won't be revealed!

roles.help: All around good base stats combined with a strong dual typing allows you to fill multiple roles! For the time being, you can /quake to kill at night but flying types will evade this. You can also /outrage to kill during the day but fairy types will evade this. These kills won't reveal you either! As long as Tyranitar (or Mega Tyranitar) is in, you have a 50% chance to evade nightkills thanks to your Sand Veil ability.
roles.info: Can quake (kill) one person during the night. Can outrage (kill) one person during the standby (user is not revealed). Has a 50% chance to evade nightkills. ~Sided~
roles.players: When Tyranitar or Mega Tyranitar are alive.

outrage.msg: You can now kill someone with /outrage [name]. Fairy types will evade this, but you won't be revealed!

roles.help: With the fall of your fellow ally Tyranitar, you no longer have a chance to evade any nightkills! However, you can still kill at night with /quake and kill during the day with /outrage!
roles.info: Can  quake (kill) one person during the night. Can outrage (kill) one person  during the standby (user is not revealed). ~Sided~
roles.players: When Tyranitar and Mega Tyranitar are dead.

outrage.msg: You can now kill someone with /outrage [name]. You won't be revealed, but fairy-types evade this kill!

roles.help: You've got more power thanks to your mega evolution. With the help of your Sand Force ability, your /quake now has a 30% chance to pierce protection! You can still use /outrage to kill during the day as well! Lastly, you have a 50% chance to evade nightkills!
roles.info: Can quake (kill, 30% pierce chance) one person during the night. Can outrage (kill) one person during the standby (user is not revealed). Has a 50% chance to evade nightkills. ~Sided~
roles.players: When Tyranitar or Mega Tyranitar are alive.

outrage.msg: You can now kill someone with /outrage [name]. This won't reveal you, but fairy-types will evade it!

roles.help: With the fall of your  fellow ally Tyranitar, you no longer have a chance to evade any  nightkills or pierce protection! However, you can still kill at night with /quake and kill  during the day with /outrage!
roles.info: Can  quake (kill) one person during the night. Can  outrage (kill) one person during the standby (user is not revealed). ~Sided~
roles.players: When Tyranitar and Mega Tyranitar are dead.

outrage.msg: You can now kill someone with /outrage [name]. This won't reveal you, but fairy-types will evade it!

roles.help: You can communicate with others using your aura. If a trainer gives you a massage, you will become happier, and if you are happy enough, you will evolve into Lucario! Until then, you have no commands, but you can't be lynched thank to your -100 voteshield!
roles.info: Evolves into Lucario if it receives 5 massages. Voteshield of -100. ~Sided~

roles.help: You can communicate with  others using your aura. If a trainer gives you a massage, you will  become happier, and if you are happy enough, you will evolve into  Lucario! Until then, you have no commands, but you can't be lynched  thank to your -100 voteshield!

You are finally happy enough and will evolve into Lucario tonight!

curse.curseConvertMessage: A Riolu has evolved into a Lucario!

roles.help: At long last, you have evolved and your true power has been unleashed! You can kill during the night using /punch or /combat, and your intense training allows you to ignore distractors and counter nightkills! As a steel type, you are also immune to poison.
roles.info: Can punch (kill) or combat (kill) one person during the night. Can't be distracted or poisoned. Counters nightkills. ~Sided~

kill.targetmsg: You tried to kill Lucario, but you were no  match for him in close combat.
kill.msg: A foolish ~Role~ tried to attack you, but you easily disposed of them.

roles.help: The original, the first, you are the genesis of mega evolution. Dominate your enemies in combat using either /punch or /combat. Your kills have a 50% chance to pierce protection, you can't be distracted or poisoned, and you counter all nightkills!
roles.info: Can punch (kill, 50% pierce chance) or combat (kill, 50% pierce chance) one person during the night. Can't be distracted or poisoned. Counters nightkills. ~Sided~

kill.targetmsg: You tried to kill Lucario, but you were no match for him in close combat.
kill.msg: A foolish ~Role~ tried to attack you, but you easily disposed of them.

roles.help: You spend most of your time at the summits of mountains, coming down only during wintertime. As a result, you have no commands, but will evolve into Abomasnow on the fifth night. However, if you are lynched, you will also evolve early!
roles.info: Evolves into Abomasnow on night 5 or if lynched. ~Sided~

curse.curseConvertMessage: A Snover has evolved into an Abomasnow!

lynch.convertmsg: Under heavy attack, a ~Old~ has evolved into an ~New~ to protect itself!

roles.help: You live a very quiet life, whipping up blizzards wherever you go. This has given you the nickname of the ice monster. During the day, let your snowstorms reign supreme using /blizzard to kill one person. No one will be able to see you through all of the hail, so you won't be revealed. Your snowstorms are so intense that you will counter daykills!
roles.info: Can blizzard (kill) one person during the standby (user is not revealed). Counters daykills. ~Sided~

blizzard.msg: You can now kill someone with /blizzard [name]. You won't be revealed!
blizzard.killmsg: Abomasnow summons a howling blizzard to strike ~Target~, instantly freezing them to death!

actions.daykillrevengemsg: ~Target~ tried to attack Abomasnow, but the ongoing blizzard proved to be too much for them. They froze to death.

roles.help: [Snowstorm intensifies]. As the winds rage even faster and the snow falls even harder, you only grow stronger under the fierce hailstorm. In addition to your ability to counter daykills and kill during the day (/blizzard), you can now kill a second person during the day using /hammer!
roles.info: Can blizzard (kill) one person during the standby (user is not revealed). Can hammer (kill) a second person during the standby (user is not revealed). Counters daykills. ~Sided~

blizzard.msg: You can now kill someone with /blizzard [name]. You won't be revealed!
blizzard.killmsg: Mega Abomasnow summons a howling blizzard to strike ~Target~, instantly freezing them to death!

hammer.msg: You can kill a second peron with /hammer [name]. You won't be revealed!
hammer.killmsg: Mega Abomasnow slams its large and rugged body into ~Target~, overpowering them and easily defeating them!

actions.daykillrevengemsg: ~Target~ tried to attack Mega Abomasnow, but the ongoing blizzard proved to be too much for them. They froze to death.

roles.help: You want to see as many pokemon as possible, so during the night, you can give them items and /trade some to help them evolve! During the night, use /shiny to evolve Floette, /sachet and /trade to evolve Spritzee, /dream and /trade to evolve Swirlix, /coat and /trade to evolve Scyther, /dawn to evolve Kirlia, /trade to evolve Kadabra, and /trade to evolve Haunter! You have to /massage Riolu five times to evolve it. To help you find out who is what pokemon, you can use your pokedex to /identify someone's role to yourself during the day! Lastly, once a game, you can use /mega on someone at night to mega evolve them! Your dedication to filling the pokedex allows you to evade all nightkillls, daykills, and poison, while giving you a -100 voteshield to ensure that you can't be lynched! You also win with any side!
roles.info: Can give items to people during the night to help them evolve. Can trade people during the night to evolve them. Can massage one person (Riolu) during the night. Can identify (inspect) one person during the standby (user is not revealed). Evades nightkills and daykills. Can't be poisoned. Voteshield of -100. ~Sided~

dummy.msg: ±Info: ~Self~ doesn't need an item to evolve!

identify.msg: You can type /identify [name] to find out someone's role!
identify.exposemsg: A trainer has used their pokedex to find a ~Role~!

shiny.convertmsg: A Floette has been given a Shiny Stone and evolved into Florges!
shiny.tarmsg: You have received a Shiny Stone and evolved!

sachet.convertmsg: A Spritzee has received a sachet!

dream.convertmsg: A Swirlix has received a whipped dream!
dream.tarmsg: You have received a whipped dream!

coat.convertmsg: A Scyther has received a metal coat!
coat.tarmsg: You have received a metal coat!

trade.convertmsg: A ~Old~ has been traded, causing them to evolve into a/an ~New~!
trade.tarmsg: A trainer has traded you, and now you have evolved!

dawn.convertmsg: A Kirlia has been given a Dawn Stone and evolved into Gallade!
dawn.tarmsg: You have received a Dawn Stone and evolved!

massage.convertmsg: A Riolu has received a massage, making it happier!
massage.tarmsg: What a lovely massage! You are happier now!

mega.convertmsg: ~Old~'s mega stone is reacting to a trainer's mega ring! ~Old~ has mega evolved into ~New~!

changelog: 8/2/2015: Made purrloin be liepard in 3 player games and made non-peak more viable for village to win.
8/2/2015 Part 2: Made it so Gallade can't be converted into a Gardevoir.
8/2/2015 Part 3: Made 4 player games have Tyranitar instead of Mega Tyranitar in them.
8/3/2015: Made Florges evade all daykills instead of 2 while fixing Tyranitar/Mega Tyranitar's help/infos.
1/31/2016: Corrected the poison for the Bulbasaur evolution line.
